title: Idyllic Oxford Escape by River Thames Just 15 Minutes from City Centre
description: Discover a world of storied laneways, literary legends and dreaming spires at voco™ Oxford Spires, surrounded by hills of rolling green and the gentle waters of the Thames. Just a short wander to the city's vibrant centre, experience Oxford's endless charm, or spend your days relaxing in style - lazing onsite by The Willow Club’s magnificent indoor pool or indulging at Deacons Restaurant with espresso crème caramel and an expansive wine list.
location_description: voco™ Oxford Spires, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Abingdon Road, Oxford OX1 4PS, United Kingdom

vendor_name: The Randolph Hotel by Graduate Hotels
title: Victorian Heritage Stay in the Dreaming Spires of Oxford
description: Discover the next chapter in boutique luxury at The Randolph Hotel by Graduate Hotels, a celebration of Oxford’s legendary literature tucked amid the University of Oxford’s medieval colleges. Ensconced by historic architecture and located directly opposite the prestigious Ashmolean Museum, the hotel’s Victorian exterior hides a treasure trove of surprises - rooms salute famous university alumni including Lewis Carroll and Oscar Wilde, the walls are emblazoned with native Oxfordian flora and collegiate shields hang proudly from the ceiling. With an onsite wellness centre, four bohemian restaurants and bars and an unbeatable location, you’ll only ever be a short stumble from some of the best pubs in England - this is an Oxford escape worth writing about.
location_description: The Randolph Hotel by Graduate Hotels
offer_address: Beaumont St, Oxford OX1 2LN, United Kingdom

title: Stylish Oxford Retreat with Onsite Bar & Restaurant
description: Escape to a medieval British town with modern charm with a stay at Holiday Inn Oxford, an IHG Hotel - peacefully located ten-minutes from the heart of this thriving university town. Oxford University is the defining feature of this countryside destination, boasting historic foundations, must-see architecture, and fascinating museums. Spend your evenings enjoying a hearty British meal at the onsite Open Lobby Restaurant accompanied by a well-deserved pint.
location_description: Holiday Inn Oxford, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Peartree Roundabout, Woodstock Rd, Oxford OX2 8JD, United Kingdom

title: Stylish & Historic Country Escape near Oxford City Centre
description: Escape to the country and unwind amid the medieval character and manicured gardens at voco™ Oxford Thames, a memorable escape in the heart of Oxfordshire. An idyllic launchpad to exploring the history and culture of Oxford and its surrounds, this serene stay is just arms reach from the region's most iconic landmarks. Onsite, enjoy a modern fitness centre and leisure spa with a Grecian-inspired heated indoor swimming pool, plus dining at Napiers Restaurant or Crusaders Bar & Lounge.
location_description: voco™ Oxford Thames, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Henley Road, Sandford-on-Thames, Oxford OX4 4GX, United Kingdom
